:GYM_11

IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_11

  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_299 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_299 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord 767.1537 4.8323 999.7185 radius 50.0 50.0 10.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_143 
GET_CHAR_AREA_VISIBLE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $GYMFIGHT_INTERIOR 
IF 
  $GYMFIGHT_INTERIOR == 5 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_143 
LOAD_AND_LAUNCH_MISSION_INTERNAL 9  // Lowrider (Bet And Dance)

  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord 768.4777 -37.1737 999.6865 radius 50.0 50.0 10.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_221

  $GYMFIGHT_INTERIOR == 6 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_221 
LOAD_AND_LAUNCH_MISSION_INTERNAL 10  // Beefy Baron

  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord 766.5975 -65.293 999.6562 radius 50.0 50.0 10.0 sphere 0

  $GYMFIGHT_INTERIOR == 7

  $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYM_324

GOTO @GYM_11 
SCRIPT_NAME 'SHOOT' 

:SHOOT_11
WAIT 125 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_324 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_238 
IF 
  not $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_231 
IF 
  $ONMISSION_SHOOTING == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_231 
IF 
  $SHOOTING_AVAILABLE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_231 
$SHOOTING_INDEX = 0 

:SHOOT_110
IF 
  4 > $SHOOTING_INDEX 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_231 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $SHOOTING_X($SHOOTING_INDEX,4f) $SHOOTING_Y($SHOOTING_INDEX,4f) $SHOOTING_Z($SHOOTING_INDEX,4f) radius 20.0 20.0 10.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_217 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_217 
$ONMISSION = 1 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $SHOOTING_INDEX_2 = $SHOOTING_INDEX 
LOAD_AND_LAUNCH_MISSION_INTERNAL 19  // Cesar Vialpando

:SHOOT_217
$SHOOTING_INDEX += 1 
GOTO @SHOOT_110 

:SHOOT_231
GOTO @SHOOT_281 

:SHOOT_238
IF 
  not $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_281 
IF 
  $SHOOTING_AVAILABLE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_281 
$SHOOTING_AVAILABLE = 1 

:SHOOT_281
IF 
  $SHOOTING_AVAILABLE == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_324 
IF 
  $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SHOOT_324 
$SHOOTING_AVAILABLE = 0 

:SHOOT_324
GOTO @SHOOT_11

MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) = -1 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11221 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11375 

:IMPEXPM_11368
4@ += 1 

:IMPEXPM_11375
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11409 

:IMPEXPM_11382
MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) = -1 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11221 

:IMPEXPM_11409
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11228 

:IMPEXPM_11416
IF 
  4@ == 5 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11453 
MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES[4] 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES[4] = -1 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11221 

:IMPEXPM_11453
RETURN 
4@ = 0 

:IMPEXPM_11462
IF 
  5 > 4@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11681 
IF 
  not $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11667 
IF 
  DOES_VEHICLE_EXIST $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11647 
IF 
  not IS_CAR_DEAD $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11620 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11613 
IF 
  not LOCATE_CHAR_ANY_MEANS_CAR_2D $PLAYER_ACTOR car $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) radius 500.0 500.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11613 
MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) = -1 

:IMPEXPM_11613
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11640 

:IMPEXPM_11620
MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) = -1 

:IMPEXPM_11640
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11667 

:IMPEXPM_11647
MARK_CAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED $IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) 
$IMPORT_CAR_HANDLES(4@,5i) = -1 

:IMPEXPM_11667
4@ += 1 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11462 

:IMPEXPM_11681
RETURN 

:IMPEXPM_11683
4@ = 0 

:IMPEXPM_11690
IF 
  10 > 4@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11872 
IF 
  $CURRENT_WANTED_LIST == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11741 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 5@ = 4@ 
5@ += 0 

:IMPEXPM_11741
IF 
  $CURRENT_WANTED_LIST == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11774 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 5@ = 4@ 
5@ += 10 

:IMPEXPM_11774
IF 
  $CURRENT_WANTED_LIST == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11807 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 5@ = 4@ 
5@ += 20 

:IMPEXPM_11807
IF 
  $EXPORT_CARS_STATUS(4@,10i) == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPM_11847 
SWITCH_CAR_GENERATOR $PARKED_IMPEXPM_CARS(5@,30i) num_generations 101 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11858 

:IMPEXPM_11847
SWITCH_CAR_GENERATOR $PARKED_IMPEXPM_CARS(5@,30i) num_generations 0 

:IMPEXPM_11858
4@ += 1 
GOTO @IMPEXPM_11690 

:IMPEXPM_11872
RETURN

SCRIPT_NAME 'IMPEXPC' 

:IMPEXPC_11
WAIT 5000 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_306 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_306 
IF 
  $1909 == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_306 
IF and
  not IS_HELP_MESSAGE_BEING_DISPLAYED 
  not IS_MESSAGE_BEING_DISPLAYED 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_306 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_281 
IF 
  0@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_274 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $TEMPVAR_ACTOR_CAR 
GET_CAR_MODEL $TEMPVAR_ACTOR_CAR store_to 1@ 
2@ = 0 
3@ = 0 

:IMPEXPC_147
IF 
  10 > 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_238 
IF 
  IS_INT_VAR_EQUAL_TO_INT_LVAR $CAR_MODELS_TO_EXPORT(2@,10i) == 1@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_224 
IF 
  $EXPORT_CARS_STATUS(2@,10i) == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_224 
3@ = 1 
2@ = 10 

:IMPEXPC_224
2@ += 1 
GOTO @IMPEXPC_147 

:IMPEXPC_238
IF 
  3@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_274 
PRINT_HELP 'IE22'  // You can export this vehicle over at Easter Basin Docks.
0@ = 1 

:IMPEXPC_274
GOTO @IMPEXPC_306 

:IMPEXPC_281
IF 
  0@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @IMPEXPC_306 
0@ = 0 

:IMPEXPC_306
GOTO @IMPEXPC_11 

:HJ
SET_DEATHARREST_STATE 0 
SCRIPT_NAME 'HJ' 

:HJ_15
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_42 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_42
IF 
  ARE_ANY_CAR_CHEATS_ACTIVATED 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_62 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_62
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_TRAIN $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_85 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_85
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_FLYING_VEHICLE $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_108 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_108
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_BOAT $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_131 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_131
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #VORTEX 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_157 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_157
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_CONTROL_ON $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_180 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_180
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1668 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
GET_WHEELIE_STATS $PLAYER_CHAR store_two_wheel_info_to $HJ_TWOWHEELS_TIME $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FLOAT wheelie_info_to $HJ_WHEELIE_TIME $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT stoppie_info_to $HJ_STOPPIE_TIME $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
IF 
  $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FLOAT > 0.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_426 
$HJ_TWOWHEELS_TIME /= 1000 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_INT = float_to_int $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT = int_to_float $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT -= $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT *= 100.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_REM = float_to_int $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_BONUS = $HJ_TWOWHEELS_TIME 
ADD_INT_VAR_TO_INT_VAR $HJ_BONUS += $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
$HJ_BONUS /= 2 
ADD_SCORE $PLAYER_CHAR value $HJ_BONUS 
IF 
  ARE_MEASUREMENTS_IN_METRES 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_385 
PRINT_WITH_4_NUMBERS 'WHEEL01' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_INT $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_METERS_REM $HJ_TWOWHEELS_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // TWO WHEELS DOUBLE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~.~1~m Time: ~1~ seconds
GOTO @HJ_426 

:HJ_385
CONVERT_METRES_TO_FEET $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FLOAT store_to $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FEET = float_to_int $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
PRINT_WITH_3_NUMBERS 'WHEEL02' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_TWOWHEELS_DISTANCE_FEET $HJ_TWOWHEELS_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // TWO WHEELS DOUBLE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~ feet Time: ~1~ seconds

:HJ_426
IF 
  $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT > 0.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_631 
$HJ_WHEELIE_TIME /= 1000 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT = float_to_int $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT = int_to_float $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT -= $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT *= 100.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_REM = float_to_int $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_BONUS = $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
$HJ_BONUS *= 2 
$HJ_BONUS /= 5 
$HJ_BONUS /= 2 
ADD_SCORE $PLAYER_CHAR value $HJ_BONUS 
IF 
  ARE_MEASUREMENTS_IN_METRES 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_590 
PRINT_WITH_4_NUMBERS 'WHEEL06' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_METERS_REM $HJ_WHEELIE_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // WHEELIE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~.~1~m Time: ~1~ seconds
GOTO @HJ_631 

:HJ_590
CONVERT_METRES_TO_FEET $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT store_to $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FEET = float_to_int $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
PRINT_WITH_3_NUMBERS 'WHEEL07' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_WHEELIE_DISTANCE_FEET $HJ_WHEELIE_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // WHEELIE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~ feet Time: ~1~ seconds

:HJ_631
IF 
  $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT > 0.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_822 
$HJ_STOPPIE_TIME /= 1000 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT = float_to_int $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT = int_to_float $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT -= $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_FLOAT 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT *= 100.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_REM = float_to_int $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_BONUS = $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT 
$HJ_BONUS /= 2 
ADD_SCORE $PLAYER_CHAR value $HJ_BONUS 
IF 
  ARE_MEASUREMENTS_IN_METRES 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_781 
PRINT_WITH_4_NUMBERS 'WHEEL11' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_INT $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_METERS_REM $HJ_STOPPIE_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // STOPPIE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~.~1~m Time: ~1~ seconds
GOTO @HJ_822 

:HJ_781
CONVERT_METRES_TO_FEET $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FLOAT store_to $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FEET = float_to_int $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FEET_FLOAT 
PRINT_WITH_3_NUMBERS 'WHEEL12' numbers $HJ_BONUS $HJ_STOPPIE_DISTANCE_FEET $HJ_STOPPIE_TIME time 3000 flag 1  // STOPPIE BONUS: $ ~1~ Distance: ~1~ feet Time: ~1~ seconds

:HJ_822
IF 
  IS_CAR_IN_AIR_PROPER $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1654 
$HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT = 0 
$HJ_CAR_ANGLE_BEGIN_STUNT = 0.0 
$1293 = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_FLIPS = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_FLIPPING_FLAG = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT = 0 
$HJ_BEGIN_STUNT_FLAG = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT = 0 
$HJ_CAR_Z_MAX = -100.0 
$HJ_CAR_X = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_Y = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_Z = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_X_BEGIN_STUNT = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_Y_BEGIN_STUNT = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_Z_BEGIN_STUNT = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_X_END_STUNT = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_Y_END_STUNT = 0.0 
$HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT = 0.0 
$HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_REM = 0 
$HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT_REM = 0 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = 0.0 
$1316 = 0.0 
$HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_FLOAT = 0.0 
$1317 = 0.0 
$HJ_CAR_ANGLE = 0.0 
$1301 = 0 
$1340 = 0 

:HJ_1082
IF or
  IS_CAR_IN_AIR_PROPER $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
  10 > $1301 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1647 
$1301 += 1 
GET_CAR_COORDINATES $HJ_PLAYER_CAR store_to $HJ_CAR_X $HJ_CAR_Y $HJ_CAR_Z 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_CAR_ANGLE = $HJ_CAR_ANGLE_BEGIN_STUNT 
IF 
  $HJ_BEGIN_STUNT_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1191 
GET_CAR_HEADING $HJ_PLAYER_CAR store_to $HJ_CAR_ANGLE 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_CAR_X_BEGIN_STUNT = $HJ_CAR_X 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_CAR_Y_BEGIN_STUNT = $HJ_CAR_Y 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_CAR_Z_BEGIN_STUNT = $HJ_CAR_Z 
$HJ_BEGIN_STUNT_FLAG = 1 

:HJ_1191
WAIT 0 
IF 
  IS_CAR_DEAD $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1218 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_1218
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1241 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_1241
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1264 
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_1264
IF and
  not IS_CAR_UPRIGHT $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
  $HJ_STUNT_FLIPPING_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1294 
$HJ_STUNT_FLIPPING_FLAG = 1 

:HJ_1294
IF and
  IS_CAR_UPRIGHT $HJ_PLAYER_CAR 
  $HJ_STUNT_FLIPPING_FLAG == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1331 
$HJ_STUNT_FLIPS += 1 
$HJ_STUNT_FLIPPING_FLAG = 0 

:HJ_1331
GET_CAR_HEADING $HJ_PLAYER_CAR store_to $HJ_CAR_ANGLE_BEGIN_STUNT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $1316 = $HJ_CAR_ANGLE_BEGIN_STUNT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $1316 -= $HJ_CAR_ANGLE 
IF 
  $1316 > 180.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1409 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $1317 = $1316 
$1316 = 360.0 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $1316 -= $1317 
GOTO @HJ_1456 

:HJ_1409
IF 
  -180.0 > $1316 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1456 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $1317 = $1316 
$1316 = 360.0 
ADD_FLOAT_VAR_TO_FLOAT_VAR $1316 += $1317 

:HJ_1456
IF 
  0.0 > $1316 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1503 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $1317 = $1316 
$1316 = 0.0 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $1316 -= $1317 

:HJ_1503
ADD_FLOAT_VAR_TO_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_FLOAT += $1316 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT = float_to_int $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_FLOAT 
IF 
  IS_FLOAT_VAR_GREATER_THAN_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_CAR_Z > $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1546 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX = $HJ_CAR_Z 

:HJ_1546
$HJ_CAR_Z = 0.0 
IF 
  $1340 == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1640 
GET_CAR_COORDINATES $HJ_PLAYER_CAR store_to $HJ_CAR_X_END_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_END_STUNT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
GET_DISTANCE_BETWEEN_COORDS_2D $HJ_CAR_X_BEGIN_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_BEGIN_STUNT and $HJ_CAR_X_END_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_END_STUNT store_to $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
IF 
  $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT > 20.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1640 
RANDOM_PASSENGER_SAY $HJ_PLAYER_CAR speech 37 
$1340 = 1 

:HJ_1640
GOTO @HJ_1082 

:HJ_1647
GOTO @HJ_1661 

:HJ_1654
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_1661
GOTO @HJ_1675 

:HJ_1668
GOTO @HJ_15 

:HJ_1675
IF 
  $HJ_BEGIN_STUNT_FLAG == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1864 
GET_CAR_COORDINATES $HJ_PLAYER_CAR store_to $HJ_CAR_X_END_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_END_STUNT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
GET_DISTANCE_BETWEEN_COORDS_2D $HJ_CAR_X_BEGIN_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_BEGIN_STUNT and $HJ_CAR_X_END_STUNT $HJ_CAR_Y_END_STUNT store_to $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT 
REGISTER_FLOAT_STAT 139 value $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT = float_to_int $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX -= $HJ_CAR_Z_BEGIN_STUNT 
REGISTER_FLOAT_STAT 140 value $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT = float_to_int $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = int_to_float $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT -= $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_FLOAT 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT *= 100.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_REM = float_to_int $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = int_to_float $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX -= $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT = $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX 
$HJ_TEMP_FLOAT *= 100.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT_REM = float_to_int $HJ_TEMP_FLOAT 
REGISTER_INT_STAT 141 value $HJ_STUNT_FLIPS 
REGISTER_INT_STAT 142 value $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT 

:HJ_1864
IF 
  $HJ_CAR_Z_MAX > 4.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1892 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT += 1 

:HJ_1892
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT > 40 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1917 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT += 1 

:HJ_1917
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_FLIPS > 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1942 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT += 1 

:HJ_1942
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT > 360 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_1968 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT += 1 

:HJ_1968
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT > 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2385 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_STUNT_BONUS = $HJ_STUNT_FLIPS 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS *= 180 
ADD_INT_VAR_TO_INT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_BONUS += $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP = $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP *= 6 
ADD_INT_VAR_TO_INT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_BONUS += $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP = $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP *= 45 
ADD_INT_VAR_TO_INT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_BONUS += $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_TEMP 
IF 
  $1293 == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2081 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS *= 2 

:HJ_2081
MULT_INT_VAR_BY_INT_VAR $HJ_STUNT_BONUS *= $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS /= 3 
$HJ_STUNT_BONUS /= 5 
ADD_SCORE $PLAYER_CHAR value $HJ_STUNT_BONUS 
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2155 
PRINT_WITH_NUMBER 'HJ_IS' number $HJ_STUNT_BONUS time 2000 flag 1  // INSANE STUNT BONUS: $~1~
REGISTER_INT_STAT 143 value 1 

:HJ_2155
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2199 
PRINT_WITH_NUMBER 'HJ_DIS' number $HJ_STUNT_BONUS time 2000 flag 1  // DOUBLE INSANE STUNT BONUS: $~1~
REGISTER_INT_STAT 143 value 3 

:HJ_2199
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT == 3 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2243 
PRINT_WITH_NUMBER 'HJ_TIS' number $HJ_STUNT_BONUS time 2000 flag 1  // TRIPLE INSANE STUNT BONUS: $~1~
REGISTER_INT_STAT 143 value 5 

:HJ_2243
IF 
  $HJ_STUNT_BONUS_MULT == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2287 
PRINT_WITH_NUMBER 'HJ_QIS' number $HJ_STUNT_BONUS time 2000 flag 1  // QUADRUPLE INSANE STUNT BONUS: $~1~
REGISTER_INT_STAT 143 value 7 

:HJ_2287
IF 
  ARE_MEASUREMENTS_IN_METRES 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HJ_2341 
PRINT_WITH_6_NUMBERS 'HJSTAT' numbers $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_REM $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT_REM $HJ_STUNT_FLIPS $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT time 5000 flag 5  // Distance: ~1~.~1~m Height: ~1~.~1~m Flips: ~1~ Rotation: ~1~|
GOTO @HJ_2385 

:HJ_2341
CONVERT_METRES_TO_FEET_INT $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT 
CONVERT_METRES_TO_FEET_INT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT 
PRINT_WITH_4_NUMBERS 'HJSTATF' numbers $HJ_STUNT_DISTANCE_MAX_INT $HJ_STUNT_HEIGHT $HJ_STUNT_FLIPS $HJ_STUNT_ROTATION_INT time 5000 flag 5  // Distance: ~1~ft Height: ~1~ft Flips: ~1~ Rotation: ~1~|

:HJ_2385
GOTO @HJ_15 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:GFINIT
SCRIPT_NAME 'GFINIT' 
$GIRL_DESIRED_PROGRESS_TO_INVITE[0] = 30 
$GIRL_PROGRESS[0] = 15 
$GIRL_DESIRED_SEXAPPEAL[0] = -100 
$GIRLRESPECT[0] = 200 
$377[0] = 0 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 1 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 3 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 11 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 16 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 17 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 20 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 21 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $377[0] bit 27 
$371[0] = 0 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $371[0] bit 3 
$383[0] = 0 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $383[0] bit 6 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $383[0] bit 8 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $383[0] bit 10 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $383[0] bit 12 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $383[0] bit 14

:FRTEXT
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
SCRIPT_NAME 'FRTEXT' 
WAIT 5000 
CLEAR_HELP 
PRINT_HELP 'FREI_16'  // The freight oddjob has been passed. You can replay it to make extra cash.
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
SCRIPT_NAME 'ENTEXT' 
0@ = -1 

:ENTEXT_18
IF 
  not IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_INT_VAR 0@ == $1012 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_53 
WAIT 0 
GET_AREA_VISIBLE 0@ 
GOTO @ENTEXT_18 

:ENTEXT_53
SWITCH_ENTRY_EXIT s$1014 to $1013 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
$38 = 0 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  $PHONE_RINGING_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  $FREEFALL_STAGE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 20 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  not IS_MINIGAME_IN_PROGRESS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_212 
$38 = 1 

:ENTEXT_212
RETURN 

:ENTEXT_214
$TIME_FROM_LAST_CALL_GOT_FLAG = 0 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  $ACTIVE_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  $PHONE_RINGING_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  $FREEFALL_STAGE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 20 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  not IS_MINIGAME_IN_PROGRESS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_ON_FOOT $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  not IS_GANG_WAR_FIGHTING_GOING_ON 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
IF 
  not IS_WANTED_LEVEL_GREATER $PLAYER_CHAR than 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_449 
GET_GAME_TIMER $TEMPVAR_CALL_TIME 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT $TIME_FROM_LAST_CALL = $TEMPVAR_CALL_TIME 
SUB_INT_VAR_FROM_INT_VAR $TIME_FROM_LAST_CALL -= $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS 
$TIME_FROM_LAST_CALL_GOT_FLAG = 1 

:ENTEXT_449
RETURN 

:ENTEXT_451
SET_FADING_COLOUR 0 0 0 
DO_FADE 500 fade 0 

:ENTEXT_466

  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ENTEXT_490 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @ENTEXT_466 

:ENTEXT_490

:NONAME_7
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:SAVE
SCRIPT_NAME 'SAVE' 
ADD_SHORT_RANGE_SPRITE_BLIP_FOR_CONTACT_POINT 2496.8 -1700.1 24.39 sprite 35 store_to $11226 
CHANGE_BLIP_DISPLAY $11226 to 2 

:SAVE_40
WAIT 0 
CREATE_PICKUP #PICKUPSAVE type 3 at 2491.3 -1699.7 1014.75 store_to $11227 

:SAVE_68
WAIT 0 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SAVE_68 
IF 
  HAS_PICKUP_BEEN_COLLECTED $11227 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SAVE_68 
SAVE_118()
GOTO @SAVE_40 

:SAVE_118
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SAVE_227 
$ONMISSION = 1 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 
WAIT 350 
ACTIVATE_SAVE_MENU 

:SAVE_157
IF 
  not HAS_SAVE_GAME_FINISHED 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SAVE_181 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @SAVE_157 

:SAVE_181
SET_CHAR_COORDINATES $PLAYER_ACTOR to 2493.03 -1701.17 1014.8 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 1 
$ONMISSION = 1 
WAIT 350 
$ONMISSION = 0 

:SAVE_227
RETURN

  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 11 
  $MOVE_AXIS_X > 100 
  -100 > $MOVE_AXIS_Y

  36 > $6067

$6068 = 1

  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 9

  $MOVE_AXIS_Y > 100

  $6067 > 0

$6067 -= 1

SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[14] = 'SHTR_E'  // E
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[15] = 'SHTR_F'  // F
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[16] = 'SHTR_G'  // G
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[17] = 'SHTR_H'  // H
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[18] = 'SHTR_I'  // I
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[19] = 'SHTR_J'  // J

SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[21] = 'SHTR_L'  // L
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[22] = 'SHTR_M'  // M
SET_VAR_TEXT_LABEL s$SHTR_CHARACTERS[23] = 'SHTR_N'  // N

//-------------External script 0 (PLAYER_PARACHUTE)---------------

:PLCHUTE
SCRIPT_NAME 'PLCHUTE' 
REQUEST_MODEL #GUN_PARA 

:PLCHUTE_16
IF 
  not HAS_MODEL_LOADED #GUN_PARA 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_43 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @PLCHUTE_16 

:PLCHUTE_43
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_59 

:PLCHUTE_59
$1498 = 0 
$FREEFALL_STAGE = 0 
$PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE = 0 
IF 
  $1498 == 999 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_118 
CREATE_PICKUP #GUN_PARA type 3 at $TEMPVAR_X_COORD $TEMPVAR_Y_COORD $TEMPVAR_Z_COORD store_to $PICKUP_PARACHUTE 

:PLCHUTE_118
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_5455 
IF 
  not IS_2PLAYER_GAME_GOING_ON 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_5455 
IF 
  not $FREEFALL_STAGE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_176 
SET_PLAYER_CYCLE_WEAPON_BUTTON $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 

:PLCHUTE_176
IF 
  $PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE > 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_219 
IF 
  not HAS_CHAR_GOT_WEAPON $PLAYER_ACTOR weapon 46 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_219 
GOSUB @PLCHUTE_5521 

:PLCHUTE_219
IF 
  $PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_274 
IF 
  HAS_CHAR_GOT_WEAPON $PLAYER_ACTOR weapon 46 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_274 
REQUEST_MODEL #PARACHUTE 
$PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE = 1 
$1498 = 0 

:PLCHUTE_274
IF 
  $PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_377 
IF 
  HAS_MODEL_LOADED #PARACHUTE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_377 
CREATE_OBJECT #PARACHUTE at $TEMPVAR_X_COORD $TEMPVAR_Y_COORD $TEMPVAR_Z_COORD store_to 17@ 
ATTACH_OBJECT_TO_CHAR 17@ char $PLAYER_ACTOR offset 0.0 0.0 0.0 rotation 0.0 0.0 0.0 
SET_OBJECT_VISIBLE 17@ to 0 
$PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE = 2 

:PLCHUTE_377
IF and
  $PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE == 2 
  $FREEFALL_STAGE == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_409 
$PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE = 3 

:PLCHUTE_409
IF and
  $FREEFALL_STAGE == 0 
  $PARACHUTE_CREATION_STAGE > 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_565 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_AIR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_565 
GET_CHAR_VELOCITY $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $1507 $1508 $1509 
IF 
  -10.0 > $1509 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PLCHUTE_565

IF 
  0 > $BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_6169 
$BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX = 84 

:COKEC_6169
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "BCE_POINT_TO_EDIT" $BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX 

:COKEC_6193
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 131 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_6223 
$Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) += 0.5 

:COKEC_6223
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 130 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_6253 
$Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) += -0.5 

:COKEC_6253
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 128 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_6283 
$X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) += 0.5 

:COKEC_6283
IF

$X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) += -0.5 

:COKEC_6313
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 145 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_6343

:COKEC_6460

:COKEC_6489
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 137 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_7511 
SAVE_NEWLINE_TO_DEBUG_FILE

SAVE_INT_TO_DEBUG_FILE $BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX 
SAVE_NEWLINE_TO_DEBUG_FILE 
2@ = 0 

:COKEC_6651
IF 
  85 > 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_7511 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "CAMERA_POINT_AT -       OFFSET FROM CAR = " 
SAVE_INT_TO_DEBUG_FILE 2@ 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "BOX COORDS = " 
SAVE_FLOAT_TO_DEBUG_FILE $X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 
SAVE_NEWLINE_TO_DEBUG_FILE 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "TOTAL_LAPS = 1" 
SAVE_INT_TO_DEBUG_FILE 2@ 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "TOTAL_RACERS = 6" 
SAVE_FLOAT_TO_DEBUG_FILE $Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 
SAVE_NEWLINE_TO_DEBUG_FILE 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "RACER_MODEL[" 
SAVE_INT_TO_DEBUG_FILE 2@ 
SAVE_STRING_TO_DEBUG_FILE "] = MALE01" 
SAVE_FLOAT_TO_DEBUG_FILE $Z_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 
SAVE_NEWLINE_TO_DEBUG_FILE 
2@ += 1 
GOTO @COKEC_6651 

:COKEC_7511
IF 
IS_PS2_KEYBOARD_KEY_JUST_PRESSED 97 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_7614 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT 2@ = $BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX 
2@ -= 1 
IF 
  0 > 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_7566 
2@ = 0 

:COKEC_7566
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) = $X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) = $Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $Z_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) = $Z_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS(2@,85f) 

:COKEC_7614
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @COKEC_7716 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ANY_MEANS_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) $Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) $Z_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) radius 1.0 1.0 1.0 sphere 0 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ANY_MEANS_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $X_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) $Y_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) $Z_BCE2_CHECKPOINTS($BCE_CHECKPOINTS_INDEX,85f) radius 0.5 0.5 0.5 sphere 0 

:COKEC_7716
RETURN 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

//-------------External script 4 (SLOT_MACHINE)---------------

:BANDIT
SCRIPT_NAME 'BANDIT' 
4@ = 0 
6@ = 0 
10@ = 0.0 
11@ = 0.0 
12@ = 0.0 
13@ = 0 
GENERATE_RANDOM_INT_IN_RANGE 0 5 store_to 14@ 
IF 
  14@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_96 
14@ = 5 

:BANDIT_96
IF 
  14@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_121 
14@ = 1 

:BANDIT_121
IF 
  14@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_146 
14@ = 10 

:BANDIT_146
IF 
  14@ == 3 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_171 
14@ = 20 

:BANDIT_171
IF 
  14@ == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_196 
14@ = 50 

:BANDIT_196
IF 
  4@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_253 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #KB_BANDIT_U at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #CJ_WHEEL_1 at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 1@ 

:BANDIT_253
WAIT 0 
GET_GAME_TIMER $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2859 
IF 
  IS_OBJECT_WITHIN_BRAIN_ACTIVATION_RANGE 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2845 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2831 
SWITCH_START 4@ cases 7 def 0 @BANDIT_2824 case 0 @BANDIT_373 1 @BANDIT_590 2 @BANDIT_792 3 @BANDIT_1356 4 @BANDIT_1595 5 @BANDIT_1943 6 @BANDIT_2549 

:BANDIT_373
GET_OBJECT_MODEL 0@ store_to 15@ 
IF 
  HAS_MODEL_LOADED 15@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_583 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
IF 
  not DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 1@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_462 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 1 nth $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #CJ_WHEEL_1 at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 1@ 
SET_OBJECT_HEADING 1@ to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 

:BANDIT_462
IF 
  not DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_519 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 2 nth $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #CJ_WHEEL_02 at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 2@ 
SET_OBJECT_HEADING 2@ to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 

:BANDIT_519
IF 
  not DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 3@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_576 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 3 nth $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #CJ_WHEEL_03 at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 3@ 
SET_OBJECT_HEADING 3@ to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 

:BANDIT_576
4@ += 1 

:BANDIT_583
GOTO @BANDIT_2824 

:BANDIT_590
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.0 -1.0 -0.5 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
GET_USER_OF_CLOSEST_MAP_ATTRACTOR $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 1.5 object_model #KB_BANDIT_U name "PEDSLOT" store_to 16@ 
IF 
  16@ == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_785 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_758 
PRINT_HELP_FOREVER_WITH_NUMBER 'SLOT_02' number 14@  // ~k~~VEHICLE_ENTER_EXIT~ Use Slot Machine $~1~
SET_PLAYER_ENTER_CAR_BUTTON $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 
LOAD_MISSION_AUDIO 4 id 1814 
GOSUB @BANDIT_2873 
4@ += 1 
GOTO @BANDIT_785 

:BANDIT_758
IF 
  13@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_785 
REMOVE_TEXTURE_DICTIONARY 
13@ = 0 

:BANDIT_785
GOTO @BANDIT_2824

  16@ == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1306

GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1299

  17@ == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1249 
IF 
  not IS_MINIGAME_IN_PROGRESS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1249 
GOSUB @BANDIT_2873 
IF 
  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 15 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1249 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT $3396 = 14@ 
$3396 -= 1 
IF 
  IS_SCORE_GREATER $PLAYER_CHAR than $3396 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1229 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 
HIDE_CHAR_WEAPON_FOR_SCRIPTED_CUTSCENE $PLAYER_ACTOR hide 1 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
TASK_CHAR_SLIDE_TO_COORD_AND_PLAY_ANIM $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 angle $TEMPVAR_ANGLE radius 0.4 anim "SLOT_PLYR" ifp "CASINO" framedelta 4.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time 0 
SET_VAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT $3396 = 14@ 
$3396 *= -1 
ADD_SCORE $PLAYER_CHAR value $3396 
INCREMENT_INT_STAT 35 by 14@ 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_INT $3401 = int_to_float 14@ 
$3401 *= 0.001 
INCREMENT_FLOAT_STAT 81 by $3401 
CLEAR_HELP 
SET_MINIGAME_IN_PROGRESS 1 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT 5@ = $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
5@ += 750 
4@ += 1 
GOTO @BANDIT_1249 

:BANDIT_1229
ADD_ONE_OFF_SOUND 0.0 0.0 0.0 sound 1053 

:BANDIT_1249
GOTO @BANDIT_1299 

:BANDIT_1256

  13@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1283 
REMOVE_TEXTURE_DICTIONARY

:BANDIT_1283

:BANDIT_1299

  12@ > 10.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1764

$3400 = 0 

:BANDIT_1779
IF 
  3 > $3400 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1929

  10@($3400,3f) > 0.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1915

IF or
  7@($3400,3f) > 360.0 
  7@($3400,3f) == 360.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_1891 
7@($3400,3f) -= 360.0

SET_OBJECT_ROTATION 1@($3400,3i) to 7@($3400,3f) 0.0 $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 

:BANDIT_1915
$3400 += 1 
GOTO @BANDIT_1779 

:BANDIT_1929
GOSUB @BANDIT_2873 
GOTO @BANDIT_2824 

:BANDIT_1943
IF 
  IS_INT_VAR_GREATER_THAN_INT_LVAR $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 > 5@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2370

IF 
  0.6 > 10@(6@,3f) 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2370

$3401 /= 20.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3396 = float_to_int $3401 
$3396 *= 20 
CSET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT $3401 = int_to_float $3396

SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $3402 -= $3401 
IF 
  10.0 > $3402 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BANDIT_2356 
10@(6@,3f) = 0.0

$3401 /= 20.0 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3396 = float_to_int $3401 
CSET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT 7@(6@,3f) = int_to_float $3396 
7@(6@,3f) *= 20.0 
GENERATE_RANDOM_INT_IN_RANGE 750 1000 store_to $3396 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT 5@ = $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
ADD_INT_VAR_TO_INT_LVAR 5@ += $3396

  2 > 6@

  IS_INT_VAR_EQUAL_TO_INT_VAR $3413($3396,18i) == $3431($COLOR_RED,18i) 
  IS_INT_VAR_EQUAL_TO_INT_VAR $3413($3396,18i) == $3449($COLOR_GREEN,18i)

//-------------External script 6 (OTB_SCRIPT)---------------

:OTB_MSC
SCRIPT_NAME 'OTB_MSC' 
1@ = 0 
IF 
  1@ == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_58 
CREATE_OBJECT #OTB_MACHINE at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:OTB_MSC_58
WAIT 0 
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_625 
IF 
  IS_OBJECT_WITHIN_BRAIN_ACTIVATION_RANGE 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_589 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_555 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset -1.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_521 
IF 
  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 15 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_478 
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_471 
CLEAR_HELP 
1@ = 0 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_455 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_432 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_425 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 
SET_EVERYONE_IGNORE_PLAYER $PLAYER_CHAR to 1 
DO_FADE 500 fade 0 

:OTB_MSC_298
IF 
  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_322 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @OTB_MSC_298 

:OTB_MSC_322
$VIDEO_GAME = 4 
WAIT 0 
WAIT 0 
WAIT 0 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_425 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_382 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 1 

:OTB_MSC_382
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset -2.0 0.0 -1.0 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
SET_CHAR_COORDINATES $PLAYER_ACTOR to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 

:OTB_MSC_425
GOTO @OTB_MSC_448 

:OTB_MSC_432
PRINT_NOW 'BUSY' time 3000 flag 1  // You look a bit busy, why don't you come back later.

:OTB_MSC_448
GOTO @OTB_MSC_471 

:OTB_MSC_455
PRINT_NOW 'BUSY' time 3000 flag 1  // You look a bit busy, why don't you come back later.

:OTB_MSC_471
GOTO @OTB_MSC_514 

:OTB_MSC_478
IF 
  1@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_514 
PRINT_HELP_FOREVER 'OTB_A'  // ~k~~VEHICLE_ENTER_EXIT~ Use ITB Machine
1@ = 1 

:OTB_MSC_514
GOTO @OTB_MSC_548 

:OTB_MSC_521
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_548 
CLEAR_HELP 
1@ = 0 

:OTB_MSC_548
GOTO @OTB_MSC_582 

:OTB_MSC_555
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_582 
CLEAR_HELP 
1@ = 0 

:OTB_MSC_582
GOTO @OTB_MSC_618 

:OTB_MSC_589
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_616 
CLEAR_HELP 
1@ = 0 

:OTB_MSC_616
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:OTB_MSC_618
GOTO @OTB_MSC_654 

:OTB_MSC_625
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @OTB_MSC_652 
CLEAR_HELP 
1@ = 0 

:OTB_MSC_652
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:OTB_MSC_654
GOTO @OTB_MSC_58 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT

  1@ == -1

  IS_OBJECT_WITHIN_BRAIN_ACTIVATION_RANGE 0@

  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_679

IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_645

  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 15

1@ = 0

  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_563

  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_524

  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_COIN_OP_2

$VIDEO_GAME = 1 
GOTO @ARCADE_464 

:ARCADE_354
IF or
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_COIN_OP_3 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #SWANK_CONSOLE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_393 
$VIDEO_GAME = 0 
GOTO @ARCADE_464

  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_COIN_OP_1 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #SNESISH 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_432 
$VIDEO_GAME = 3 
GOTO @ARCADE_464 

:ARCADE_432

  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_COIN_OP 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #LOW_CONSOLE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_464 
$VIDEO_GAME = 2 

:ARCADE_464
WAIT 0 
WAIT 0 
WAIT 0

  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_517

  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_517 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 1 

:ARCADE_517
GOTO @ARCADE_556 

:ARCADE_524
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_CONTROL_ON $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_556 
PRINT_NOW 'BUSY' time 3000 flag 1  // You look a bit busy, why don't you come back later.

:ARCADE_556
GOTO @ARCADE_595 

:ARCADE_563

  IS_PLAYER_CONTROL_ON $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @ARCADE_595 
PRINT_NOW 'BUSY' time 3000 flag 1  // You look a bit busy, why don't you come back later.

:ARCADE_595
GOTO @ARCADE_638 

:ARCADE_602

  1@ == 0

//-------------External script 8 (VENDING_MACHINE)---------------

:VENDING
SCRIPT_NAME 'VENDING' 
1@ = 0 
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_80 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #VENDMACHFD at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #KB_BEER at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 3@ 

:VENDING_80
WAIT 0 
GET_GAME_TIMER $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1579 
IF 
  IS_OBJECT_WITHIN_BRAIN_ACTIVATION_RANGE 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1484 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1391 
IF 
  1@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_173 
REQUEST_ANIMATION "VENDING" 
1@ += 1 

:VENDING_173
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_395 
IF 
  HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "VENDING" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_384 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.0 -1.0 0.5 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_377 
IF or
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #VENDIN3 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_CANDYVENDOR 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_EXT_CANDY 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_343 
LOAD_MISSION_AUDIO 4 id 42601 
PRINT_HELP_FOREVER 'SLOT_04'  // ~k~~VEHICLE_ENTER_EXIT~ Buy Snack: $1
GOTO @VENDING_363 

:VENDING_343
LOAD_MISSION_AUDIO 4 id 42600 
PRINT_HELP_FOREVER 'SLOT_05'  // ~k~~VEHICLE_ENTER_EXIT~ Buy Drink: $1

:VENDING_363
SET_PLAYER_ENTER_CAR_BUTTON $PLAYER_CHAR to 0 
1@ += 1 

:VENDING_377
GOTO @VENDING_395 

:VENDING_384
REQUEST_ANIMATION "VENDING" 

:VENDING_395
IF 
  1@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1210 
IF 
  HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "VENDING" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1199 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.0 -1.0 0.5 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
IF or
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #VENDIN3 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_CANDYVENDOR 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_EXT_CANDY 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_512 
LOAD_MISSION_AUDIO 4 id 42601 
GOTO @VENDING_521 

:VENDING_512
LOAD_MISSION_AUDIO 4 id 42600 

:VENDING_521
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1176 
IF 
  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 15 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1169 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1169 
IF 
  IS_SCORE_GREATER $PLAYER_CHAR than 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1141 
IF 
  HAS_MISSION_AUDIO_LOADED 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @VENDING_1134 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.0 -0.2 0.6 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #CJ_JUICE_CAN at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 3@ 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK $3395 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.2 -1.0 0.0 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
TASK_CHAR_SLIDE_TO_COORD_AND_PLAY_ANIM -1 coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 angle $TEMPVAR_ANGLE radius 0.4 anim "VEND_USE" ifp "VENDING" framedelta 4.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 1 time 0 
IF or
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #VENDIN3 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_CANDYVENDOR 
  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_EXT_CANDY

:VENDING_859

$TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 /= 2.0

  DOES_OBJECT_HAVE_THIS_MODEL 0@ model #CJ_EXT_CANDY

//-------------External script 9 (FOOD_VENDOR)---------------

:FODVEND
SCRIPT_NAME 'FODVEND' 
1@ = 0 
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_58 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #ICESCART_PROP at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:FODVEND_58
WAIT 0 
GET_GAME_TIMER $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_1130 
IF 
  IS_OBJECT_WITHIN_BRAIN_ACTIVATION_RANGE 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_1075 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_1022 
IF 
  not HAS_OBJECT_BEEN_UPROOTED 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_924 
IF 
  1@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_469 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset -1.0 0.0 -1.0 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3404 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 
$3404 -= 0.5 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3405 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 
$3405 -= 0.5 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3406 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3401 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 
$3401 += 0.5 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3402 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 
$3402 += 0.5 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $3403 = $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
$3403 += 2.0 
IF 
  not IS_AREA_OCCUPIED $3404 $3405 $3406 to $3401 $3402 $3403 solid 0 car 0 actor 1 object 0 particle 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_462 
IF 
  not IS_POINT_ON_SCREEN $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 1.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_455 
REQUEST_MODEL #BMOCHIL 
IF 
  HAS_MODEL_LOADED #BMOCHIL 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_455 
CREATE_CHAR 4 model #BMOCHIL at $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 store_to 2@ 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 1.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $3404 $3405 $3406 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $3404 -= $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 
SUB_FLOAT_VAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $3405 -= $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 
GET_HEADING_FROM_VECTOR_2D $3404 $3405 store_to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
SET_CHAR_HEADING 2@ to $TEMPVAR_ANGLE 
1@ += 1 

:FODVEND_455
GOTO @FODVEND_469 

:FODVEND_462
MARK_MODEL_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED #BMOCHIL 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:FODVEND_469
IF 
  1@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_742 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_OBJECT_2D $PLAYER_ACTOR object 0@ radius 8.0 8.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_742 
REQUEST_ANIMATION "VENDING" 
IF 
  HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "VENDING" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_742 
IF 
  IS_SCORE_GREATER $PLAYER_CHAR than 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_742 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_OBJECT_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 1.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 radius 0.6 0.6 1.0 sphere 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_742 
GET_CHAR_HEALTH $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $3396 
$3396 += 50 
SET_CHAR_HEALTH $PLAYER_ACTOR to $3396 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM_SECONDARY $PLAYER_ACTOR anim "VEND_EAT1_P" ifp "VENDING" framedelta 4.0 loopA 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time -1

SET_LVAR_INT_TO_VAR_INT 3@ = $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 
3@ += 3000

1@ += 1 

:FODVEND_742
IF 
  1@ == 2

  IS_INT_VAR_GREATER_THAN_INT_LVAR $CURRENT_TIME_IN_MS2 > 3@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @FODVEND_802

  HAS_MODEL_LOADED 9@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GATEOS_502 
IF 
  LOCATE_CHAR_ANY_MEANS_OBJECT_2D $PLAYER_ACTOR object 0@ radius 12.0 12.0 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GATEOS_477 
IF or
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #BARRACKS 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #PATRIOT 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #RHINO 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GATEOS_366 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 5 nth $3401 $3402 $3403 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 6 nth $3404 $3405 $3406 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 7 nth $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
GET_DISTANCE_BETWEEN_COORDS_2D $3404 $3405 and $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
$TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 *= -1.0 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_ANGLED_AREA_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR from $3401 $3402 $3403 to $3404 $3405 $3406 angle $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 sphere 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GATEOS_366 
1@ = 1 

:GATEOS_366
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 1 nth $3401 $3402 $3403 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 2 nth $3404 $3405 $3406 
GET_LEVEL_DESIGN_COORDS_FOR_OBJECT 0@ spoot 3 nth $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 
GET_DISTANCE_BETWEEN_COORDS_2D $3404 $3405 and $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_1 $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_2 store_to $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3

  IS_CHAR_IN_ANGLED_AREA_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR from $3401 $3402 $3403 to $3404 $3405 $3406 angle $TEMPVAR_FLOAT_3 sphere 0

1@ = 1 

:GATEOS_477

  $709 == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GATEOS_502

:GATEOS_502

$6 /= 10.0 
$6 += 1.0

  $4 >= 400.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMBIKE_6146

  28@ == 1

:GYMTREA_278
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_330 
GET_OBJECT_COORDINATES 0@ store_to 1@ 2@ 3@ 
GET_OBJECT_COORDINATES 0@ store_to 7@ 8@ 9@ 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to 10@ 

:GYMTREA_330
19@ = 1.0 
$8750 = 1 
$8752 = 1 
26@ = 1.0 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 6@ = 3@ 
6@ += 1.5 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 9@ = 3@ 
9@ += 0.75 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 11@ = 10@ 
11@ -= 60.0 
SIN 11@ store_to 12@ 
COS 11@ store_to 13@ 
12@ *= 3.0 
13@ *= 3.0 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 4@ = 1@ 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 4@ -= 13@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 5@ = 2@ 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 5@ -= 12@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 11@ = 10@ 
11@ += 90.0 
SIN 11@ store_to 12@ 
COS 11@ store_to 13@ 
12@ *= 1.5 
13@ *= 1.5 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 1@ -= 13@ 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 2@ -= 12@ 
3@ += 0.1 
$1829 = 0 

:GYMTREA_573

  not DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_595

IF 
  $7 >= 170.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5243 
$7 -= 170.0 
GET_FLOAT_STAT 21 store_to $GYM_STAT_FAT 
IF 
  $GYM_STAT_FAT >= 1.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5166 
DECREMENT_FLOAT_STAT 21 by 8.0 

:GYMTREA_5166
IF 
  $8758 == 3 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5217 
$8758 = 0 
INCREMENT_FLOAT_STAT 22 by 4.0 
$GYM_DAY_LIMIT += 4.0 
GOTO @GYMTREA_5243 

:GYMTREA_5217
INCREMENT_FLOAT_STAT_NO_MESSAGE 22 by 4.0 
$GYM_DAY_LIMIT += 4.0 
$8758 += 1 

:GYMTREA_5243
IF 
  $GYM_DAY_LIMIT > 200.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5288 
GET_CURRENT_DATE $GYM_MONTH_DAY_WHEN_LIMIT_REACHED store_month_to $GYM_MONTH_WHEN_LIMIT_REACHED 
PRINT_NOW 'GYM1_1B' time 4000 flag 1  // You have reached your limit for today, come back tomorrow!

:GYMTREA_5288
CSET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_INT 25@ = int_to_float $8752 
MULT_FLOAT_VAR_BY_FLOAT_LVAR $9 *= 25@ 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_LVAR 22@ += 21@ 
CSET_VAR_INT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT $8753 = float_to_int 22@ 

:GYMTREA_5320
IF or
  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 15 
  $GYM_DAY_LIMIT > 200.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5796 
IF 
  $GYM_DAY_LIMIT > 200.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5378 
$GYM_DAY_LIMIT = 0.0 

:GYMTREA_5378
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5796 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM $PLAYER_ACTOR anim "GYM_TREAD_GETOFF" ifp "GYMNASIUM" framedelta 100.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time -1 

:GYMTREA_5443
SHAKE_PAD 0 time 1 intensity 1 
INCREMENT_INT_STAT 28 by $8753 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 29@ = TIMERA 
29@ /= 1000 
INCREMENT_INT_STAT 44 by 29@ 
CLEAR_HELP 
DELETE_MENU $8748

21@ = 0.0 
$1829 = 0

IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5668 
SET_PLAYER_CONTROL $PLAYER_CHAR to 1 
SET_CHAR_COLLISION $PLAYER_ACTOR to 1 

:GYMTREA_5668

IF 
  $1817 >= 1000.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5731

  0.0 >= $GYM_STAT_FAT 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5768

$8755 += 1

IF 
  $8756 > -40 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5843 
$8756 = -40 

:GYMTREA_5843

  IS_INT_VAR_GREATER_OR_EQUAL_TO_INT_VAR $8755 >= $8756 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMTREA_5892 
$8755 = 0

$8751 /= 10

:GYMTREA_5892

:GYMTREA_5900

//-------------External script 14 (GYMDUMB)---------------

:GYMDUMB
SCRIPT_NAME 'GYMDUMB' 
$GYM_DUMBBELLS_PANEL_SELECTED_INDEX = 1 
$8763 = 0 
27@ = 0 
$8769 = 0 
$8779 = 0.0

TIMERB = 0 
23@ = 0 
IF 
  23@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMDUMB_111 
CREATE_OBJECT_NO_OFFSET #BEACHTOWEL04 at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:GYMDUMB_111
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMDUMB_149 
GET_OBJECT_COORDINATES 0@ store_to 4@ 5@ 6@ 
GET_OBJECT_HEADING 0@ store_to 12@ 

:GYMDUMB_149
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 2@ = 4@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 3@ = 5@ 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT $8775 = 4@ 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT $8776 = 5@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 9@ = 6@ 
9@ += 1.7 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 13@ = 12@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 1@ = 12@ 
1@ -= 90.0 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT $8773 = 12@ 
$8773 -= 90.0 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT $8774 = 12@ 
$8774 += 90.0 
SIN 13@ store_to 10@ 
COS 13@ store_to 11@ 
10@ *= 0.95 
11@ *= 0.95 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 4@ -= 11@ 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_LVAR 5@ -= 10@ 
10@ *= 3.5 
11@ *= 3.5 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 7@ = 4@ 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_LVAR 7@ += 11@ 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 8@ = 5@ 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_LVAR 8@ += 10@ 
SIN 13@ store_to 10@ 
COS 13@ store_to 11@ 
10@ *= 0.95 
11@ *= 0.95 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_VAR $8775 += 11@ 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_VAR $8776 += 10@ 
10@ *= 3.5 
11@ *= 3.5 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $8777 = $8775 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $8777 -= 11@ 
SET_VAR_FLOAT_TO_VAR_FLOAT $8778 = $8776 
SUB_FLOAT_LVAR_FROM_FLOAT_VAR $8778 -= 10@ 
12@ += 180.0 
SET_LVAR_FLOAT_TO_LVAR_FLOAT 13@ = 12@ 
13@ += 90.0 
SIN 13@ store_to 10@ 
COS 13@ store_to 11@ 
10@ *= 0.2 
11@ *= 0.2 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_LVAR 2@ += 11@ 
ADD_FLOAT_LVAR_TO_FLOAT_LVAR 3@ += 10@ 
CREATE_OBJECT #KMB_DUMBBELL_R at 2@ 3@ 6@ store_to 25@ 
ATTACH_OBJECT_TO_OBJECT 25@ to_object 0@ offset 0.05 0.2 0.3 rotation 0.0 90.0 90.0 
CREATE_OBJECT #KMB_DUMBBELL_L at 2@ 3@ 6@ store_to 26@ 
ATTACH_OBJECT_TO_OBJECT 26@ to_object 0@ offset 0.05 -0.2 0.3 rotation 0.0 90.0 90.0 
6@ += 0.1 
$GYM_GYMBIKE_LEVEL = 1 
$1829 = 0 

:GYMDUMB_683
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GYMDUMB_715 
DELETE_OBJECT 25@ 
DELETE_OBJECT 26@ 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT

  $1817 >= 1000.0

  0.0 >= $GYM_STAT_FAT

  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR

  not IS_THIS_HELP_MESSAGE_BEING_DISPLAYED 'SGPUNT'  // ~h~Gambling Skill~w~ - Gambler level reached. Your maximum wager has increased to $1,000. You can now borrow up to $1,000 from the casino.
  not IS_THIS_HELP_MESSAGE_BEING_DISPLAYED 'SGGAMB'  // ~h~Gambling Skill~w~ - Professional level reached. Your maximum wager has increased to $10,000. You can now borrow up to $10,000 from the casino.

  not IS_THIS_HELP_MESSAGE_BEING_DISPLAYED 'SGHIRO'  // ~h~Gambling Skill~w~ - Whale level reached. Your maximum wager has increased to $1,000,000. You can now borrow up to $1,000,000 from the casino.
GOTO_IF_FALSE @BLACKJ_34656

:BLACKJ_34656

10@ = 0 

:BLACKJ_34665

  8 > 10@

//-------------External script 19 (DEALER)---------------

:DEALER
SCRIPT_NAME 'DEALER' 
13@ = 0 
IF 
  13@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DEALER_60 
CREATE_CHAR 17 model #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:DEALER_60
1@ = 0 
2@ = 0 
11@ = -1 
14@ = 0 
IF and
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DEALER_338 
GET_CHAR_COORDINATES 0@ store_to 3@ 4@ 5@ 
GET_NAME_OF_INFO_ZONE 3@ 4@ 5@ store_to s$9451 
SET_LVAR_TEXT_LABEL 17@s = s$9451 
COPY_SHARED_CHAR_DECISION_MAKER 65539 store_to $9453 
SET_CHAR_DECISION_MAKER 0@ to $9453 
SET_CHAR_MONEY 0@ to 2000 
START_SETTING_UP_CONVERSATION 0@ 
SET_UP_CONVERSATION_NODE_WITH_SPEECH 'DEAL1' 'DEAL2' 'DEAL3' speech 192 77 78  // You want some stuff? // Take it easy man. // Fuck you man!
GET_INT_STAT 64 store_to 13@ 
IF 
  13@ >= 500 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DEALER_271 
SET_UP_CONVERSATION_END_NODE_WITH_SPEECH 'DEAL2' speech 79  // Take it easy man.
SET_UP_CONVERSATION_END_NODE_WITH_SPEECH 'DEAL3' speech 75  // Fuck you man!
GOTO @DEALER_297 

:DEALER_271
SET_UP_CONVERSATION_END_NODE_WITH_SPEECH 'DEAL2' speech 80  // Take it easy man.
SET_UP_CONVERSATION_END_NODE_WITH_SPEECH 'DEAL3' speech 76  // Fuck you man!

:DEALER_297
GET_CURRENT_LANGUAGE 13@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 13@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DEALER_329 
FINISH_SETTING_UP_CONVERSATION_NO_SUBTITLES 
GOTO @DEALER_331 

:DEALER_329

:HMLES

  $9454 == 1

  not $1787 == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @HMLES_159

  DOES_CHAR_EXIST 0@

  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@

  $9455 == 2

$1787 = 1 

:HMLES_236
WAIT 0

  DOES_CHAR_EXIST 0@ 
  12@ == 0

  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@

  IS_CHAR_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR

  $9454 == 0

  $9455 == 0

//-------------External script 21 (POOL_SCRIPT)---------------

:POOL
SCRIPT_NAME 'POOL' 
IF 
  $9462 == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_84

  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_75

GOTO @POOL_86 

:POOL_84
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

:POOL_86
3@ = 0 

:POOL_93
WAIT 0 
IF 
  3@ == -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_251 
CREATE_OBJECT #K_POOLTABLESM at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 
CREATE_CHAR 4 model #MALE01 at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 1@ 
CREATE_OBJECT #K_POOLTABLESM at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 2@ 
CREATE_CHAR 4 model #MALE01 at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $9458 
CREATE_OBJECT #K_POOLTABLESM at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $9457 
CREATE_OBJECT #K_POOLTABLESM at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to $9459 

:POOL_251
IF 
  3@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_474 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_467 
IF 
  CAN_PLAYER_START_MISSION $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_453 
IF 
  not IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_439 
GENERATE_RANDOM_INT_IN_RANGE 0 2 store_to 5@ 
IF 
  5@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_360 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_CONSTANT 7@ = 66 
GOTO @POOL_367 

:POOL_360
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_CONSTANT 7@ = 67 

:POOL_367
REQUEST_MODEL 7@ 
REQUEST_ANIMATION "POOL" 
REQUEST_MODEL #POOLCUE 

:POOL_385
IF or
  not HAS_MODEL_LOADED 7@ 
  not HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "POOL" 
  not HAS_MODEL_LOADED #POOLCUE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @POOL_425 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @POOL_385 

:POOL_425
3@ += 1 
GOTO @POOL_446

GOSUB @POOL_2110

  7@ > 0

  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR

  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 15@

  HAS_CHAR_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_CHAR 15@ char $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFMEET_227

6@ = 0

  8@ == 1

  IS_CHAR_DEAD 17@

6@ = 0

//-------------External script 25 (GF_DATE)---------------

:GFDATE
SCRIPT_NAME 'GFDATE' 
1@ = 0 
2@ = 0 
3@ = 0 
24@ = 0 
30@ = -1 
29@ = -1 
$9467 = 30 
$9468 = 30.0 
IF 
  3@ > 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_120 
CREATE_CHAR 5 model #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE 0@ store_to 28@ 

:GFDATE_120
GOSUB @GFDATE_24076 
SET_LOCAL_VAR_BIT_CONST 3@ bit 1 

:GFDATE_134
WAIT 0 
IF and
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_260 
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_244 
GOSUB @GFDATE_26752 
GOSUB @GFDATE_24246 
GOSUB @GFDATE_283 
GOSUB @GFDATE_3688 
IF 
  IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 22 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_230 
GOSUB @GFDATE_27210 

:GFDATE_230
GOSUB @GFDATE_30455 
GOTO @GFDATE_253 

:GFDATE_244
CLEAR_HELP 
GOSUB @GFDATE_32517 

:GFDATE_253
GOTO @GFDATE_276 

:GFDATE_260
CLEAR_HELP 
SET_LOCAL_VAR_BIT_CONST 3@ bit 9 
GOSUB @GFDATE_32517 

:GFDATE_276
GOTO @GFDATE_134 

:GFDATE_283
IF 
  not IS_LOCAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST 3@ bit 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_3686 
IF 
  IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 26 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_342 
SET_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_CONST $390 bit 2 
1@ = 3 
2@ = 0 
RETURN 

:GFDATE_342
GOSUB @GFDATE_20055 
IF 
  24@ > -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_462 
IF 
  IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 11 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_414 
GOSUB @GFDATE_32407 
DO_FADE 0 fade 0 
1@ = 2 
2@ = 0 
RETURN 

:GFDATE_414
IF 
  IS_GLOBAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST $390 bit 13 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_455 
GOSUB @GFDATE_32407 
1@ = 10 
2@ = 0 
RETURN 

:GFDATE_455
GOTO @GFDATE_503 

:GFDATE_462
IF 
  24@ == -2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_503 
GOSUB @GFDATE_32407 
1@ = 3 
2@ = 0 
RETURN

GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_859

1@ = 11

:GFDATE_843

2@ = 0

  not 1@ == 4

:GFDATE_1253

  IS_LOCAL_VAR_BIT_SET_CONST 3@ bit 5

:GFDATE_1327

  not 1@ == 1

:GFDATE_1375

  TIMERA > 10000

IF or
  1@ == 1 
  1@ == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_1465

:GFDATE_1479

:GFDATE_1571

:GFDATE_1585

  TIMERA > 120000

IF or
  $GIRLFRIEND == 3 
  $GIRLFRIEND == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @GFDATE_1675

  TIMERA > 240000

:GFDATE_1675

//-------------External script 27 (CASINO_AMBIENCE)---------------

:CASAMB
SCRIPT_NAME 'CASAMB' 
IF 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_43 
$9470 = 0 
$9471 = 0 

:CASAMB_43
1@ = 1 
IF 
  IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL16_EQUAL_TO_TEXT_LABEL v$ACTIVE_INTERIOR_NAME == "MAFCAS" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_91 
REQUEST_MODEL #VMAFF1 
REQUEST_MODEL #VMAFF3 
REQUEST_MODEL #VMAFF2 
REQUEST_MODEL #VWFYWAI 

:CASAMB_91
IF 
  IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL16_EQUAL_TO_TEXT_LABEL v$ACTIVE_INTERIOR_NAME == "TRICAS" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_130 
REQUEST_MODEL #BMYBOUN 
REQUEST_MODEL #WMYBOUN 
REQUEST_MODEL #VWFYWA2 

:CASAMB_130
IF 
  IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL16_EQUAL_TO_TEXT_LABEL v$ACTIVE_INTERIOR_NAME == "CASINO2" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_170 
REQUEST_MODEL #BMYBOUN 
REQUEST_MODEL #WMYBOUN 
REQUEST_MODEL #VWFYCRP 

:CASAMB_170
REQUEST_ANIMATION "BAR" 

:CASAMB_177
IF 
  not HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "BAR" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_206 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @CASAMB_177 

:CASAMB_206
OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK 2@ 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM -1 anim "BARSERVE_IN" ifp "BAR" framedelta 4.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time -1 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM -1 anim "BARSERVE_LOOP" ifp "BAR" framedelta 4.0 loop 1 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time 10000 
CLOSE_SEQUENCE_TASK 2@ 
OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK 3@ 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM -1 anim "BARSERVE_BOTTLE" ifp "BAR" framedelta 4.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time -1 
CLOSE_SEQUENCE_TASK 3@ 
OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK 4@ 
TASK_WANDER_STANDARD -1 
CLOSE_SEQUENCE_TASK 4@ 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @CASAMB_1779 
RESET_NUM_OF_MODELS_KILLED_BY_PLAYER $PLAYER_CHAR 
IF

:PLANES

  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR

//-------------External script 33 (TRAINS)---------------

:TRAINS
SCRIPT_NAME 'TRAINS' 
$TRAINS_TRAIN_SPEED = 0.0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_44 
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_44
SET_DEATHARREST_STATE 0 

:TRAINS_48
WAIT 0 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_754 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_SITTING_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_740 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #STREAKC 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_726 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
IF 
  $TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_181 
GET_CAR_SPEED $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE store_to $TRAINS_TRAIN_SPEED 
IF 
  $TRAINS_TRAIN_SPEED > 0.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_181 
PRINT_NOW 'TRAINS' time 20000 flag 1  // Press ~k~~VEHICLE_ACCELERATE~ to skip to the next station.
$TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN = 1 

:TRAINS_181
IF 
  $TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_619 
IF 
  IS_NEXT_STATION_ALLOWED $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_429 
IF 
  IS_BUTTON_PRESSED 0 button 16 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_422 
DO_FADE 1000 fade 0 

:TRAINS_239
IF 
  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_286 
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_279 
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_279
GOTO @TRAINS_239 

:TRAINS_286
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_361 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_SITTING_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_361 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #STREAKC 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_361 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
SKIP_TO_NEXT_ALLOWED_STATION $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
CLEAR_THIS_PRINT 'TRAINS'  // Press ~k~~VEHICLE_ACCELERATE~ to skip to the next station.

:TRAINS_361
DO_FADE 1000 fade 1 

:TRAINS_368
IF 
  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_415 
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_408 
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_408
GOTO @TRAINS_368 

:TRAINS_415
$TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN = 2 

:TRAINS_422
GOTO @TRAINS_619 

:TRAINS_429
DO_FADE 1000 fade 0 

:TRAINS_436
IF 
  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_483 
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_476 
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_476
GOTO @TRAINS_436 

:TRAINS_483
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_558 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_SITTING_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_558 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #STREAKC 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_558 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
SKIP_TO_NEXT_ALLOWED_STATION $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
CLEAR_THIS_PRINT 'TRAINS'  // Press ~k~~VEHICLE_ACCELERATE~ to skip to the next station.

:TRAINS_558
DO_FADE 1000 fade 1 

:TRAINS_565
IF 
  GET_FADING_STATUS 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_612 
WAIT 0 
IF 
  not IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_605 
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_605
GOTO @TRAINS_565 

:TRAINS_612
$TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN = 2 

:TRAINS_619
IF 
  $TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_719 
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_719 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_SITTING_IN_ANY_CAR $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_719 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_IN_MODEL $PLAYER_ACTOR model #STREAKC 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_719 
STORE_CAR_CHAR_IS_IN_NO_SAVE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
IF 
  IS_CAR_STOPPED $TRAINS_TRAIN_HANDLE 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @TRAINS_719 
$TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN = 0 

:TRAINS_719
GOTO @TRAINS_733 

:TRAINS_726
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_733
GOTO @TRAINS_747 

:TRAINS_740
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_747
GOTO @TRAINS_761 

:TRAINS_754
GOTO @TRAINS_768 

:TRAINS_761
GOTO @TRAINS_48 

:TRAINS_768
$TRAINS_TEXT_SHOWN = 0 
CLEAR_THIS_PRINT 'TRAINS'  // Press ~k~~VEHICLE_ACCELERATE~ to skip to the next station.
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

//-------------External script 34 (ZERO_AMBIENCE)---------------

:RCSHOP
SCRIPT_NAME 'RCSHOP' 
$9526 = 0 
2@ = -2237.291 
3@ = 128.5856 
4@ = 1034.422 
5@ = 0.0 
6@ = 360.0 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_CONSTANT 10@ = 217 
REQUEST_MODEL 10@ 

:RCSHOP_81
IF 
  not HAS_MODEL_LOADED 10@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_108 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @RCSHOP_81 

:RCSHOP_108
OPEN_SEQUENCE_TASK 7@ 
TASK_STAY_IN_SAME_PLACE -1 to 1 
TASK_STAND_STILL -1 time -2 
CLOSE_SEQUENCE_TASK 7@ 
ADD_ATTRACTOR 2@ 3@ 4@ angle 5@ unknown_angle 6@ task_sequence 7@ store_to 8@ 
CREATE_CHAR_AT_ATTRACTOR 4 model 10@ queue 8@ task 1466 store_to 9@ 

:RCSHOP_169
IF 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_509 
GET_CHAR_AREA_VISIBLE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $1250 
IF or
  $1250 == 0 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_225 
GOSUB @RCSHOP_520 

:RCSHOP_225
IF and
  $ZERO_TOTAL_PASSED_MISSIONS == 3 
  $ONMISSION == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_305 
IF 
  LOCATE_STOPPED_CHAR_ON_FOOT_3D $PLAYER_ACTOR coord -2219.287 133.8895 1034.641 radius 1.5 1.5 1.5 sphere 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_305 
$VIDEO_GAME = 7 

:RCSHOP_305
IF or
  IS_CHAR_SHOOTING $PLAYER_ACTOR 
  IS_WANTED_LEVEL_GREATER $PLAYER_CHAR than $PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_336 
$9526 = 1 

:RCSHOP_336
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 9@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_418 
IF and
  IS_PLAYER_TARGETTING_CHAR $PLAYER_CHAR char 9@ 
  not IS_CURRENT_CHAR_WEAPON $PLAYER_ACTOR weapon 56 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_392 
$9526 = 1 
GOTO @RCSHOP_418 

:RCSHOP_392
IF 
  HAS_CHAR_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_CHAR 9@ char $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_418 
$9526 = 1 

:RCSHOP_418
IF 
  $9526 == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_509 
GET_CHAR_COORDINATES $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to 2@ 3@ 4@ 
GET_RANDOM_CHAR_IN_SPHERE_NO_BRAIN 2@ 3@ 4@ radius 20.0 store_to 0@ 
IF 
  0@ > -1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @RCSHOP_509 
1@ += 1 
START_NEW_STREAMED_SCRIPT 37 (CUSTOMER_PANIC) 0@ 1@ 
STREAM_SCRIPT 37 (CUSTOMER_PANIC) 

:RCSHOP_509
WAIT 0 
GOTO @RCSHOP_169 

:RCSHOP_520
$9526 = 0 
MARK_CHAR_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED 9@ 
MARK_MODEL_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED 10@ 
DELETE_CHAR 9@ 
CLEAR_ATTRACTOR 8@ 
CLEAR_SEQUENCE_TASK 7@ 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT

  13@ > 0

  not 6@ == 2

IF 
  22@ == 3 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8548 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_014' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Keep going!

:DANCE_8548
IF 
  22@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8582 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_015' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Missed it!

:DANCE_8582
IF 
  22@ == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8616 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_016' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~You're fast!

:DANCE_8616
IF 
  22@ == 10 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8650 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_017' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Wrong move!

:DANCE_8650
IF 
  22@ == 11 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8684 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_018' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Try again!

:DANCE_8684
24@ += 1 
GOTO @DANCE_8950 

:DANCE_8698
IF 
  22@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8732 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_019' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~The master!

:DANCE_8732
IF 
  22@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8766 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_020' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Got it!

:DANCE_8766
IF 
  22@ == 3 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8800 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_021' time 1000 style 5  // ~w~Acceptable!

:DANCE_8800
IF 
  22@ == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8834

:DANCE_8834
IF 
  22@ == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8868

:DANCE_8868

  22@ == 10

:DANCE_8902

  22@ == 11 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_8936

:DANCE_8936
24@ += 1 
GOTO @DANCE_8950 

:DANCE_8950
RETURN 

:DANCE_8952
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 13@ = 26@ 
ADD_INT_LVAR_TO_INT_LVAR 13@ += 27@ 
ADD_INT_LVAR_TO_INT_LVAR 13@ += 28@ 
IF 
  13@ > 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9477 
IF 
  13@ >= 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9477 
IF 
  28@ == 4 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9147 
IF or
  29@ == 1 
  29@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9101 
$9527 = 2 
TIMERA = 0 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_002' time 50000 style 7  // ~y~PERFECT
29@ = 2 
GOTO @DANCE_9140 

:DANCE_9101
$9527 = 2 
TIMERA = 0 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_004' time 50000 style 7  // ~b~GOOD
29@ = 1 

:DANCE_9140
GOTO @DANCE_9456 

:DANCE_9147
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_GREATER_THAN_INT_LVAR 26@ > 27@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9270 
IF 
  not 29@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9205 
$9527 = 4 
TIMERA = 0 
GOTO @DANCE_9238 

:DANCE_9205
IF 
  TIMERA >= 10000

$9527 = 4 
TIMERA = 0 

:DANCE_9238

29@ = 1 
GOTO @DANCE_9456 

:DANCE_9270
IF 
  29@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9334 
$9527 = 3 
TIMERA = 0 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_004' time 50000 style 7  // ~b~GOOD
29@ = 1 
GOTO @DANCE_9456 

:DANCE_9334
IF 
  29@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9398 
$9527 = 5 
TIMERA = 0 
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_003' time 50000 style 7  // ~r~BAD
29@ = 0 
GOTO @DANCE_9456 

:DANCE_9398
IF 
  TIMERA >= 10000 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCE_9431 
$9527 = 5 
TIMERA = 0 

:DANCE_9431
PRINT_BIG 'DNC_003' time 50000 style 7  // ~r~BAD
29@ = 0 

:DANCE_9456
28@ = 0 
26@ = 0 
27@ = 0 

:DANCE_9477
RETURN 

:DANCE_9479

  6@ == 3

//-------------External script 36 (SHOPKEEPER)---------------

:SKBRAIN
SCRIPT_NAME 'SKBRAIN' 
2@ = 0 
IF 
  2@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_114 
CREATE_CHAR 5 model #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 
ADD_ATTRACTOR 0.0 0.0 0.0 angle 0.0 unknown_angle 0.0 task_sequence -1 store_to 1@ 
CREATE_OBJECT #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 6@ 

:SKBRAIN_114
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_138 
SET_CHAR_DECISION_MAKER 0@ to $INTERIOR_DECISION_MAKER_B 

:SKBRAIN_138
REQUEST_ANIMATION "FOOD" 

:SKBRAIN_146
IF 
  not HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "FOOD" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_176 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @SKBRAIN_146 

:SKBRAIN_176
3@ = 1 
4@ = 0 
5@ = 0 
7@ = 0 

:SKBRAIN_204
WAIT 0 
IF and
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_377 
GET_CHAR_AREA_VISIBLE $PLAYER_ACTOR store_to $1250 
IF or
  $1250 == 0 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_283 
GOSUB @SKBRAIN_1552 
GOTO @SKBRAIN_370 

:SKBRAIN_283
IF or
  IS_PLAYER_TARGETTING_CHAR $PLAYER_CHAR char 0@ 
  HAS_CHAR_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_CHAR 0@ char $PLAYER_ACTOR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_331 
IF 
  DOES_OBJECT_EXIST 6@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_331 
DELETE_OBJECT 6@ 

:SKBRAIN_331
IF 
  $FOOD_PLAYER_AGGRESSIVE_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @SKBRAIN_363

  2@ == 1

  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@

GET_CHAR_ANIM_CURRENT_TIME 0@ anim "FF_DAM_FWD" store_to 9@ 
IF 
  9@ == 1.0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_2727 
5@ += 1 

:PCHAIR_2727
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_HEALTH_GREATER 0@ than 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_2790 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM_NON_INTERRUPTABLE 0@ anim "FF_DIE_FWD" ifp "FOOD" framedelta 16.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 1 time 0 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 

:PCHAIR_2790
GOTO @PCHAIR_2957 

:PCHAIR_2797
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_HEALTH_GREATER 0@ than 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_2867 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM_NON_INTERRUPTABLE 0@ anim "FF_DIE_FWD" ifp "FOOD" framedelta 16.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 1 time 0 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 
GOTO @PCHAIR_2950 

:PCHAIR_2867
IF 
  not IS_AREA_OCCUPIED 16@ 17@ 18@ to 19@ 20@ 21@ solid 0 car 0 actor 1 object 0 particle 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_2936 
4@ = 3 
5@ = 0 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_3035 
GOTO @PCHAIR_2950 

:PCHAIR_2936
4@ = 2 
5@ = 2 

:PCHAIR_2950
GOTO @PCHAIR_2957 

:PCHAIR_2957
RETURN 

:PCHAIR_2959
MARK_OBJECT_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED 8@ 
REMOVE_ANIMATION "FOOD" 
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3031 
SET_CHAR_SUFFERS_CRITICAL_HITS 0@ enable 1 
TASK_USE_CLOSEST_MAP_ATTRACTOR 0@ radius 100.0 model 0 from 0.0 0.0 0.0 name "PCUSTOM" 

:PCHAIR_3031
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
RETURN 

:PCHAIR_3035
WAIT 0 
IF and
  not IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL_EMPTY s$CURRENT_SHOP_GXT_NAME 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3376 
IF and
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
  IS_PLAYER_PLAYING $PLAYER_CHAR 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3369 
SWITCH_START 4@ cases 5 def 1 @PCHAIR_3355 case 1 @PCHAIR_3146 2 @PCHAIR_3228 3 @PCHAIR_3277 4 @PCHAIR_3291 5 @PCHAIR_3341 -1 @PCHAIR_3369 -1 @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3146
IF 
  5@ > 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3178 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_359 
GOTO @PCHAIR_3221 

:PCHAIR_3178
GET_SCRIPT_TASK_STATUS 0@ task 1477 store_to 7@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 7@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3221 
TASK_DUCK 0@ time -2 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 

:PCHAIR_3221
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3228
IF 
  5@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3263 
GENERATE_RANDOM_INT_IN_RANGE 0 5 store_to 6@ 
6@ *= 500 

:PCHAIR_3263
GOSUB @PCHAIR_359 
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3277
GOSUB @PCHAIR_359 
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3291
GET_SCRIPT_TASK_STATUS 0@ task 1477 store_to 7@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 7@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCHAIR_3334 
TASK_DUCK 0@ time -2 
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 

:PCHAIR_3334
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3341
GOSUB @PCHAIR_359 
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3355
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 
GOTO @PCHAIR_3369 

:PCHAIR_3369
GOTO @PCHAIR_3383 

:PCHAIR_3376
GOSUB @PCHAIR_2959 

:PCHAIR_3383
GOTO @PCHAIR_3035 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "PEDSTATE" 4@ 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "SUBSTATESTATUS" 5@ 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "TIMERB" TIMERB 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "TIMERA" TIMERA 
RETURN 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 

//-------------External script 42 (PCUSTOM)---------------

:PCUSTOM
SCRIPT_NAME 'PCUSTOM' 
2@ = 0 
IF 
  2@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_60 
CREATE_CHAR 5 model #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:PCUSTOM_60
REQUEST_ANIMATION "INT_SHOP" 

:PCUSTOM_72
IF 
  not HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "INT_SHOP" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_106 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_72 

:PCUSTOM_106
3@ = 1 
4@ = 0 
5@ = 0 
11@ = 0 

:PCUSTOM_134
WAIT 0 
IF and
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_237 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_USING_MAP_ATTRACTOR 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_223 
IF 
  $FOOD_PLAYER_AGGRESSIVE_FLAG == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_209 
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_251 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_216 

:PCUSTOM_209
GOTO @PCUSTOM_804 

:PCUSTOM_216
GOTO @PCUSTOM_230 

:PCUSTOM_223
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_727 

:PCUSTOM_230
GOTO @PCUSTOM_244 

:PCUSTOM_237
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_727 

:PCUSTOM_244
GOTO @PCUSTOM_134 

:PCUSTOM_251
SWITCH_START 3@ cases 1 def 0 @PCUSTOM_328 case 1 @PCUSTOM_314 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 -1 @PCUSTOM_328 

:PCUSTOM_314
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_330 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_328 

:PCUSTOM_328
RETURN 

:PCUSTOM_330
SWITCH_START 4@ cases 4 def 0 @PCUSTOM_725 case 0 @PCUSTOM_393 1 @PCUSTOM_451 2 @PCUSTOM_534 3 @PCUSTOM_711 -1 @PCUSTOM_725 -1 @PCUSTOM_725 -1 @PCUSTOM_725 

:PCUSTOM_393
5@ = 1 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM 0@ anim "IDLE_CHAT" ifp "PED" framedelta 4.0 loop 1 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time 5000 
4@ += 1 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_725 

:PCUSTOM_451
GET_SCRIPT_TASK_STATUS 0@ task 1541 store_to 10@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 10@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_527 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM 0@ anim "SHOP_PAY" ifp "INT_SHOP" framedelta 1000.0 loop 0 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 0 time 0 
4@ += 1 

:PCUSTOM_527
GOTO @PCUSTOM_725 

:PCUSTOM_534
GET_SCRIPT_TASK_STATUS 0@ task 1541 store_to 10@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 10@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_704 
GET_OFFSET_FROM_CHAR_IN_WORLD_COORDS 0@ offset 0.0 0.1 1.0 store_to 7@ 8@ 9@ 
IF 
  IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL_EQUAL_TO_TEXT_LABEL s$CURRENT_SHOP_GXT_NAME == 'FDPIZA'  // Pizza Stack
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_640 
CREATE_OBJECT #CJ_PIZZA_2 at 7@ 8@ 9@ store_to 12@ 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_656 

:PCUSTOM_640
CREATE_OBJECT #CJ_BURG_2 at 7@ 8@ 9@ store_to 12@ 

:PCUSTOM_656
TASK_PICK_UP_OBJECT 0@ object 12@ offset 0.0 0.0 0.0 bone 6 16 anim "NULL" ifp "NULL" time 0 
4@ += 1 

:PCUSTOM_704
GOTO @PCUSTOM_725 

:PCUSTOM_711
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_727 
GOTO @PCUSTOM_725 

:PCUSTOM_725
RETURN 

:PCUSTOM_727
REMOVE_ANIMATION "INT_SHOP" 
MARK_OBJECT_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED 12@ 
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_800 
CLEAR_CHAR_TASKS_IMMEDIATELY 0@ 
TASK_USE_CLOSEST_MAP_ATTRACTOR 0@ radius 20.0 model 0 from 0.0 0.0 0.0 name "PCHAIR" 

:PCUSTOM_800
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT 
RETURN 

:PCUSTOM_804
WAIT 0 
IF and
  not IS_VAR_TEXT_LABEL_EMPTY s$CURRENT_SHOP_GXT_NAME 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_890 
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_883 
GET_SCRIPT_TASK_STATUS 0@ task 1477 store_to 11@ 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 11@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @PCUSTOM_883 
TASK_DUCK 0@ time -2 

:PCUSTOM_883
GOTO @PCUSTOM_897 

:PCUSTOM_890
GOSUB @PCUSTOM_727 

:PCUSTOM_897
GOTO @PCUSTOM_804 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "PEDSTATE" 3@ 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "SUBSTATESTATUS" 4@ 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "LOOP_TIMER" TIMERB 
WRITE_DEBUG_WITH_INT "SCRIPT_TIMER" TIMERA 
RETURN 
TERMINATE_THIS_SCRIPT

//-------------External script 52 (DANCER)---------------

:DANCER
SCRIPT_NAME 'DANCER' 
2@ = 0 
IF 
  2@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_60 
CREATE_CHAR 5 model #NULL at 0.0 0.0 0.0 store_to 0@ 

:DANCER_60
REQUEST_ANIMATION "DANCING" 

:DANCER_71
IF 
  not HAS_ANIMATION_LOADED "DANCING" 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_104 
WAIT 0 
GOTO @DANCER_71 

:DANCER_104
IF 
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_317 
GET_CHAR_MODEL 0@ store_to 2@ 
IF 
  10 > 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_169 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 7@ = 2@ 
7@ *= 1500 
GOTO @DANCER_225 

:DANCER_169
IF 
  100 > 2@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_210 
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 7@ = 2@ 
7@ *= 150 
GOTO @DANCER_225 

:DANCER_210
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 7@ = 2@ 
7@ *= 15 

:DANCER_225
SET_LVAR_INT_TO_LVAR_INT 3@ = 2@ 
3@ /= 2 
3@ *= 2 
IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_INT_LVAR 2@ == 3@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_310 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_MALE 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_296 
8@ = 1 
GOTO @DANCER_303 

:DANCER_296
8@ = 2 

:DANCER_303
GOTO @DANCER_317 

:DANCER_310
8@ = 3 

:DANCER_317
3@ = 1 
4@ = 0 

:DANCER_331
WAIT 0 
IF and
  not IS_CHAR_DEAD 0@ 
  $PLAYER_IN_INTERIOR == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_442 
IF 
  IS_CHAR_USING_MAP_ATTRACTOR 0@ 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_428 
IF 
  $9472 == 0 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_406 
GOSUB @DANCER_456 
GOTO @DANCER_421 

:DANCER_406
SET_CHAR_DECISION_MAKER 0@ to $INTERIOR_DECISION_MAKER_A 
GOTO @DANCER_1424 

:DANCER_421
GOTO @DANCER_435 

:DANCER_428
GOSUB @DANCER_1358 

:DANCER_435
GOTO @DANCER_449 

:DANCER_442
GOSUB @DANCER_1358 

:DANCER_449
GOTO @DANCER_331 

:DANCER_456
SWITCH_START 3@ cases 1 def 0 @DANCER_540 case 1 @DANCER_519 -1 @DANCER_540 -1 @DANCER_540 -1 @DANCER_540 -1 @DANCER_540 -1 @DANCER_540 -1 @DANCER_540 

:DANCER_519
GOSUB @DANCER_1246 
GOSUB @DANCER_542 
GOTO @DANCER_540 

:DANCER_540
RETURN 

:DANCER_542
SWITCH_START 4@ cases 3 def 0 @DANCER_1244 case 0 @DANCER_605 1 @DANCER_818 2 @DANCER_1031 -1 @DANCER_1244 -1 @DANCER_1244 -1 @DANCER_1244 -1 @DANCER_1244 

:DANCER_605

IF 
  IS_INT_LVAR_EQUAL_TO_CONSTANT 2@ == 7 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_811

  8@ == 1 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_699 
TASK_PLAY_ANIM 0@ anim "DNCE_M_C" ifp "DANCING" framedelta 4.0 loop 1 lockX 0 lockY 0 lockF 1 time 7@ 
GOTO @DANCER_804 

:DANCER_699
IF 
  8@ == 2 
GOTO_IF_FALSE @DANCER_764
